description: Fresh and healthy lunch exclusive entrees. (Lunch is $1 extra after 2:30pm or Sunday)

plates.name: Speedy Gonzales
plates.description: One taco, oe enchilada, choice of rice or refried beans.

plates.name: Special Lunch 1
plates.description: Chile relleno, taco, refried beans and guacaole salad.

plates.name: Special Lunch 2
plates.description: One beef burrito, mexican rice and refried beans.

plates.name: Special Lunch 3
plates.description: Enchilada, rice and refried beans.

plates.name: Special Lunch 4
plates.description: Chile relleno, taco, refried beans and rice.

plates.name: Special Lunch 5
plates.description: Burrito, taco and rice.

plates.name: Special Lunch 6
plates.description: Chalupa, enchilada, rice and refried beans.

plates.name: Special Lunch 7
plates.description: Chalupa, chile relleno and rice.

plates.name: Special Lunch 8
plates.description: Burrioto, tamale, choice of rice or refried beans.

plates.name: Special Lunch 9
plates.description: Burrito, enchilada, choice of rice or refried beans.

plates.name: Special Lunch 10
plates.description: Enchilada, chalupa and cheese quesadilla.

plates.name: Pollo Fundido
plates.description: Two flour tortillas deep fried with chicken, topped with sour cream and nacho cheese, with a side of rice and salad.

plates.name: El Combo Special Combination
plates.description: Chalupa, chile relleno, enchilada, beef taco, burrito, ruce and refrued beans.

plates.name: California Special Burrito
plates.description: Large burrito filled with your choice of grilled chicken or steak, sauteed onions, bell peppers, tomatoes, rice and beans. Topped with melted cheese, red sauce and sour cream.

plates.name: Soft or Fried Chimichangas
plates.description: Two flour tortillas deep fried, filled with your choice of beef tips or chicken. Topped with lettuce, tomatoes, sour cream, red sauce, nacho cheese, and guacamole. Servede with choice of rice and beans.

plates.name: Mexican Chilaquiles
plates.description: Fried Torilla chips blended with our special ranchero sauce and topped with chicken or beef tips and cheese.

plates.name: Pizza Mexicana
plates.description: Two flat flour tortillas with choice of ground beef, chicken. Topped with melted cheese and red sauce. Lettuce and diced tomatoes by request. Grilled chicken or steak $1 extra.

plates.name: Taquitos Mexicanos
plates.description: Order of four fried corn taquitos (two beef and two chicken). Served with lettuce, guacamole, tomatoes and sour cream.

plates.name: Chiles Poblanos
plates.description: Two cheese stuffed poblano peppers. Topped with ranchero sauce and sour cream, Served with ricem beans and choice of corn or flour tortillas. Option to add meat for extra.

plates.name: Cancun Grill
plates.description: A choice of grilled chicken breast or carne asada (a thin sliced steak) with zucchini, squash and broccoli. Topped with melted cheese and served with rice and house salad.

plates.name: Bistec a Caballo
plates.description: Tender thin slice steak topped grilled onion and a Ranchero fried egg. Served with rice, beans and three tortillas.

description: Savor the flavors of our exquisite steak courses.

plates.name: Steak Tejano
plates.description: Grilled ribeye steak and six sauteed shrimp grilled with onions and bell peppers. Topped with ranchero sauce. Served with rice, beans, house salad and tortillas.

plates.name: Carne Asada
plates.description: Tender thin sliced steak with rice, beans and guacamole salad. Served with tortillas.

plates.name: Cancun Asada
plates.description: A tender thin sliced steak, topped with six sauteed shrimp, grilled onions and melted cheese. Served with rice, beans, guacamole salad and flour or corn tortillas.

plates.name: Cancun Cheese Steak
plates.description: Two soft flour tortillas, filled with thin sliced steak, grilled onions and topped with nacho cheese. Served with lettuce, tomatoes and your choice of rice and beans.

plates.name: Steak Ranchero
plates.description: Grilled ribeye steak. Served with rice, beans, flour tortillas and guacamole salad. Topped with our special ranchero sauce.

plates.name: Burritos de Puerco
plates.description: Two flour tortillas with pork and grilled onions. Topped with melted cheese and anchero sauce. Served with a choice of rice or beans, lettuce and pico de gallo.

plates.name: Pork Carnitas
plates.description: Tender fried pork, served with grilled onions, rice, beans, lettuce, tomatoes and guacamole. Served with flour tortillas.

plates.name: Arroz con Pollo
plates.description: A bed of rice topped with grilled chicken and melted cheese.

plates.name: Pollo Loco
plates.description: Grilled chicken, onions, bell peppers and mushrooms. Served on a bed of rice and melted cheese.

plates.name: Papo's Special
plates.description: A grilled chicken breast topped with sauteed onions, mushrooms, spinach and smothered with melted cheese. Served with rice and house salad.

plates.name: El Bigotes Special
plates.description: A grilled chicken breast on a bed of rice. Topped grilled onions, lettuce, pico de gallo, sour cream, guacamole, our spicy salsa verde and melted cheese.

plates.name: Mole Maria
plates.description: Chicken breasts, special mole sauce, rice and beans. Served with flour tortillas.

plates.name: Pollo Asado
plates.description: A delicious chicken breast with sauteed onions. Served with lettuce, pico de gallo, rice, beans and flour tortillas.

plates.name: Choripollo
plates.description: Chicken breast with grilled onions, chorizo (Mexican sausage) and melted cheese. Served with rice, beans and corn or flour tortillas.

plates.name: Pollo Encremado
plates.description: Shredded chicken with cheese and sour cream. Served with a side of rice and 3 tortillas.

plates.name: El Burro de la Roqueta
plates.description: Two flour tortillas, filled with delicious grilled chicken and onions. Topped with melted cheese, ranchero sauce and pico de gallo. Choice of rice or beans.

plates.name: Burriotos Tipicos
plates.description: Two flour tortillas, filled with beef tips or chicken, beans, topped with nacho cheese sauce with guacamole salad.

plates.name: Burritos Deluxe
plates.description: Two burritos (one chicken and beans, and one beef and beans). Topped with lettuce tomatoes, guacamole and sour cream.

plates.name: Yolandas
plates.description: Three chicken enchiladas, topped with our special enchilada sauce. Served with rice and guacamole salad.

plates.name: Enchiladas Supreme
plates.description: One chicken enchilada, one bean enchilada, one beef enchilada, one cheese enchilada. Topped with enchilada sauce, lettuce, tomato and sour cream.

plates.name: Cancun Super
plates.description: Five different enchiladas: beef, chicken, shredded beef, cheese, bean. Topped with our special enchilada sauce, cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, sour cream and guacamole.

plates.name: Elmer's Special
plates.description: A large quesadilla filled with grilled chicken, steak, shrimp, pork, ham, peppers, tomatoes and onions. Topped with our melted cheese, pico de gallo and sour cream.

plates.name: Choripapas
plates.description: A bed of french fries topped with grilled chicken, steak, shrimp, sausage, peppers, tomatoes, onions, sour cream and melted cheese.

plates.name: Shrimp Cocktail
plates.description: Shrimp with diced avacado and pico de gallo in our special cocktail sauce. Served with saltine crackers.

plates.name: Camarones a la Diabla
plates.description: Grilled shrimp, topped with spicy red salsa. Served with rice, salad and flour tortillas.

plates.name: Arroz con Camaron
plates.description: A bed of rice topped with grilled shrimp cooked with bell peppers, onions and melted cheese.

plates.name: Maria's Special
plates.description: A delicious grilled tilapia fillet with grilled shrimp. Served with rice, lettuce, sour cream, pico de gallo and corn or flour tortillas.

plates.name: Grilled Tilapia
plates.description: Grilled fillet of tilapia, served with rice and an array of sauteed vegetables and tortillas.

plates.name: Fish or Shrimp Tacos
plates.description: Three corn or flour tortillas filled with your choice of grilled shrimp or grilled tilapia, lettuce, pico de gallo and cheese. Served with rice, refried beans and lime.

plates.name: Cancun Special
plates.description: Tilapia fillet and grilled shrimp on a bed of rice smothered with spinach and chipotle sauce. Served with a house salad and tortillas.

plates.name: Seafood Chimichanga
plates.description: One large flour tortilla rolled and fried with shrimp, tilapia fillet, sour cream and rice. Topped with white melted cheese, pico de gallo cilantro and avocado.

plates.name: Soft shell - Chicken or Ground Beef
Hard Shell - Chicken or Ground Beef

description: Enjoy our selection of house made fajitas

plates.name: Fajitas
plates.description: Tender sliced beef or chicken with bell peppers, toatoes, and onions. Served with a side of guacamole salad, rice and refried beans.

plates.name: Mixed Fajitas
plates.description: Same as normal fajitas but with both beef and chicken.

plates.name: Texas Fajitas
plates.description: Tender beef, chicken and shrimp cooked with onions, tomatoes and bell peppers. Served with rice, refried beans and guacamole salad.

plates.name: Special Fajitas for Two
plates.description: Tender beef, chicken breast and shrimp, with a side of refried beans, rice and guacamole salad.

plates.name: Vegitarian Fajitas
plates.description: Grilled array of fresh vegetables including zucchini, squash, brocoli, onions, caulflower, bell peppers, tomatoes and mushrooms, with a side of rice, refried beans, and guacamole salad.

plates.name: Fajitas Tropical
plates.description: Shrimp, chicken and ham, with pineapple and mushrooms. Topped with salad and cheese sauce. Served with rice and refried beans.

plates.name: Shrimp Fajitas
plates.description: Shrimp cooked with onions, tomatoes and bell peppers. Served with rice, refried beans and guacamole salad.

plates.name: Cnacun Parrillada
plates.description: A delicious combination of steak, chicken, shrimp, pork, cornitas, chorizo, onions, bell peppers and tomatoes. Served with rice, refried beans, lettuce and pico de gallo.

description: Choose from our house recipie quesadillas.

plates.name: Quesadilla Roja (RO HA)
plates.description: Our stuffed cheese quesadilla with your choice of ground beef, beef tips, shredded beef or chicken. Served with lettuce, diced tomatoes, sour cream and our supreme sauce. Choice of refried beans or rice.

plates.name: Quesadilla Verde (VARE-DAY)
plates.description: Same choices as Roja. Served with lettuce, sour cream,diced tomatoes and guacamole.

plates.name: Cnacun Quesadilla
plates.description: Filled with grilled chicken or steak and onions. Served with a side of lettuce, tomatoes, sour cream and guacamole.

plates.name: Mushroom Quesadilla
plates.description: Served with a choice of rice or refried beans and salad.

plates.name: Spinach Quesadilla
plates.description: Served with a choice of rice or refried beans and salad.

plates.name: Vegitarian A
plates.description: One bean burrito, one cheese enchilada, one tostada with beans and nacho cheese.

plates.name: Vegitarian B
plates.description: One chalupa, one cheese enchilada and order of refried beans.

plates.name: Vegitarian C
plates.description: One bean burrito, one quesadilla and one chalupa.

plates.name: Vegitarian D
plates.description: Bean tostaguac, cheese enchilada and rice.

plates.name: Vegitarian E
plates.description: Bean burrito with nacho cheese, cheese enchilada and a cheese quesadilla.

plates.name: Vegitarian F
plates.description: One large quesadilla with tomatoes, mushrooms, onions, peppers, choice of rice or refried beans. Served with guacamole salad and sour cream.
